formal situations make me uncomfortable.

i m saving up to buy a new camera.

content.text: Hey how is your day going?
Not bad, still single at the age of 35, but I do enjoy babysitting for the woman who lives next door. How about you?
I have a busy schedule with flying and keeping up with my family, but I love my job as a pilot. What was your first purchase?
I think my first purchase was a camera, but I have to say I love Asian food, especially spicy Thai food. I like to use candles instead of lights. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go out to eat, but I usually don't get to because of my job. I do enjoy spending time with my family and going to the movies. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, but I usually don't get to because of my job. I do enjoy spending time with my family and going to the movies.
I love to go to the movies, but I rarely get to go because I'm always working. I'm glad you have family and friends to spend time with.
Thanks! I'm glad you have a job that you enjoy.
